pageTitle: Bethel College - Indiana Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {142430=Especially for the freshmen dorms, dorm life is amazing. About three times a week, any of the girls in the dorm that are wanting to eat when group dinner is called, decide where to go to eat as a group, and then walk there together, and talk as they dine at their restaurant of choice. Usually, the RA's have planned an activity at least three times a week. Whether it is decorating Christmas cookies, watching a movie, or eating takeout Thai food dinner to see how it is. The RA's are wonderful and very helpful. It takes a wonderful person to help you with your overflowing toilet at 1:00 in the morning, on finals week., 153351=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}
textBeforeTable: 12/31/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 1 of 33 Scott from Elkhart, IN Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. You could win a free scholarship. textAfterTable: Great for these types of students Anyone can come here and fit in. Professors are willing to work with you and there is a wide spread of spiritual levels on campus for all types Tips for prospective students Choose a place that fits you like a shoe :) Bang for the buck Bethel isn't cheep- but it's all worth it in the end Am enjoying being here I stepped on the campus and it felt like home. The professors here are great. I even am friends with them Am learning a lot I'm a nursing student and I love having the small classes. It means more one on one time with the professors Login to rate or flag the reviews Rachelle from Sturgis, MI 01/10/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 33
